channel.title: Logseq on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Logseq on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Go Logseq: Build My 2nd Brain
item.description: Table of Content Motivation What I Like in Logseq Reference To Be Explored Motivation Too many files For years, I have relied on typing my notes and thoughts on my laptop in plain text. The convenience of not having to carry physical paper and the ease of searching through my notes were the main reasons for this. However, as time passed, my notes became cluttered and difficult to manage(still way better than physical notebook), despite my efforts to organize them by year and month.
